references.paper_title: Aggregating inconsistent information: Ranking and clustering
references.reason: This paper introduced the fundamental concept of correlation clustering, which is the central problem addressed in the current research.
This paper provided initial theoretical analysis of correlation clustering, establishing its computational complexity and the approximability of its solutions.

references.paper_title: Combinatorial pure exploration of multi-armed bandits
references.reason: This paper introduced the framework of combinatorial multi-armed bandits (CMAB), a crucial element in the design and analysis of the query-efficient algorithms proposed in this study.

references.paper_title: Good arm identification via bandit feedback
references.reason: This paper presented the Threshold Bandit algorithm, which is adopted as a key subroutine in this study for efficient similarity estimation.
This book chapter provides a comprehensive overview of correlation clustering, which serves as a valuable background for this study
